section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The contract indicates that it is a Joint Venture, but gives one party full discretion on the purpose of the Joint Venture. Therefore the description of the purpose is in conflict of it being a Joint Venture. Giving BorrowMoney.com Inc full discretion on the purpose of the venture, conflicts with it being a Joint Venture.

section: Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The Member Duties section uses the term 'Awarded Contracts' without defining it. Does 'Awarded Contracts' mean that JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go will pay BorrowMoney.com, inc $60,000.00 USD? Or does JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go need to 'win' Awarded Contracts from Monthly Government and that BorrowMoney.com will receive a percentage. The contract does not define this.

section: This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This goes against the purpose of a Joint Venture. Giving BorrowMoney.com the discretion to change a contract with no approval from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go conflicts with the definition of a Joint Venture.
